name: Dream Dungeons (ScalphaMission)
description:
In Dreams we exist entirely in our subconscious. 

Your secrets are yours to protect so craft a dungeon in your mind to protect them. 
Other's secrets are yours for the taking..
IF you can survive the dungeons they store their secrets in.

Build a dungeon and make it as hard as you want, but you have to be able to beat it yourself if you want others to try it.

Challenge other people's dungeon in this online experience!
